discussion.title: Combine different analytical solutions
discussion.body:
Hello!
I have a problem statement as follows -
There are multiple datasets formulated when we change input current in a circuit(constant current input). I applied PySR on each dataset to get multiple analytical solutions.
Is there a way to combine these solutions and get a solution as a function of current too?
Thanks

nodes.body: Could you be a bit more specific about what you want to do? Do you want to basically compose the equations together?
